entity.name: Flexcraft Software Systems
entity.description: Flexcraft is an AI-enabled project management and deployment platform designed to automate planning, match engineers to tasks smartly, optimize sprint cycles, and deliver real-time insights for software development teams.

projects.name: Flexcraft
projects.description: An intelligent, AI-first project management platform redefining how engineering teams plan, collaborate, and deliver software. The platform provides automation of timelines, smart team-task matching, and real-time sprint analytics.

channels.description: For angel and institutional investors. Bank transfer details shared post due diligence and NDA.

Growth phase with estimated 4M users and strong profitability driven by SaaS subscription revenue.
Scale phase projected to reach 40M users with sustainable infrastructure and high-margin operations.
